author's_name_(_зохиогч): SU MA TI MA nI PRA DZNY'A,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @035A *, ,(ZHES RAB GNAS DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO'I CHAR 'BEBS KYI DGONGS DON RAB GSAL TSOGS GNYIS BANG MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI NI CHOS LA 'DUN PA DBU MDZAD CHEN MO BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS LAG TU BLANG BDE BA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR,  PAn CHEN RIN PO CHES MDZAD PA'I RAB GNAS DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO'I CHAR 'BEBS KYIS GZHI BYAS LA, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I RAB GNAS BKRA SHIS SNYE MA DANG, RGYUD CHEN DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I PHYAG LEN DANG, LCANG SKYA RDO RJE 'CHANG GIS MDZAD PA'I RAB GNAS DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO'I ZUR 'DEBS DANG, MDO RGYUD NAS PHAN YON CUNG ZAD  BTUS TE, MCHOD GA-YOG PA DANG, DBU MDZAD LA GO BDE BAR BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL LHA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA nI PRA DZNY'A, MING GZHAN 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I BKA' LUNG GIS CHING SU TZUG THU NO MON HAN DU 'BOD PAS DGE LDAN BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA 'PHEL BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GSUNG RAB LA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THUNG GA LAG PI LIG THU W'A GINDRA DHARMA TA LA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, 'GRO BA KUN GYIS TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU DKON MCHOG GSUM DANG MI 'BRAL BAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU 'THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, , )
